column5: Helped move my buddies shack into position on Thunder Lake.  The 1200 4 Tec (puuuurrrrrrr) with low gear was definitely the star of the show!   Jan 1st trout opener got a little warmerâ€¦.its gonna be chilly too.
Yep.. heading for camp on Tuesday and -34 and -35c look like the daily temps for Tue / Wed / Thur. Oh well.... hopefully nobody has stolen my red oak !
At those temps.Im sure you be HAPPY HAPPY.and not worried about yer red oak.LOL
I won't be if it's not there to put in the fire box.. otherwise we be cold...
